scripts.start-fe: echo Running FE... && cd fe && npm start && cd ..
scripts.start-sanity: echo Running Sanity... && cd fe && npm start && cd ..
scripts.install-env: echo Running FE folder... && cd fe && npm i && cd .. && echo Running SANITY folder... && cd sanity && npm i && cd .. && echo Running finished!
scripts.build-env: echo Running FE folder... && cd fe && npm run build && npm i && cd .. && echo Running SANITY folder... && cd sanity && npm run build && npm i && cd .. && echo Running finished!
